snippet: Gov. Sam Brownback faces a rebellion even among fellow Republicans over his tax-cutting philosophy, and the new ruling compounds the state’s fiscal woes....

headline.main: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB
headline.print_headline: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB

lead_paragraph: Gov. Sam Brownback faces a rebellion even among fellow Republicans over his tax-cutting philosophy, and the new ruling compounds the state’s fiscal woes.
